languages.text: "Да? Действительно. Иногда я устаю от этой маски — дай мне минуту, и мы вернемся к нашей игре". {n}Маражай с притворным почтением склоняет голову.{/n}
"No? I suppose I don't. Sometimes I tire of this mask — give me a minute and we will return to our game." {n}Marazhai inclines his head in feigned deference.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да? Действительно. Иногда я устаю от этой маски — дай мне минуту, и мы вернемся к нашей игре". {n}Маражай с притворным почтением склоняет голову.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "No? I suppose I don't. Sometimes I tire of this mask — give me a minute and we will return to our game." {n}Marazhai inclines his head in feigned deference.{/n}

"No? I suppose I don't. Sometimes I tire of this mask — give me a minute and we will return to our game." {n}Marazhai inclines his head in feigned deference.{/n}
"No? I suppose I don't. Sometimes I tire of this mask — give me a minute and we will return to our game." {n}Marazhai inclines his head in feigned deference.{/n}

languages.text: “是吗？或许吧，有时我也会厌倦这副面具——给我一分钟，我就会马上重新进入角色。”{n}玛拉斋歪了歪脑袋，假模假样地表示顺服。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No? I suppose I don't. Sometimes I tire of this mask — give me a minute and we will return to our game." {n}Marazhai inclines his head in feigned deference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是吗？或许吧，有时我也会厌倦这副面具——给我一分钟，我就会马上重新进入角色。”{n}玛拉斋歪了歪脑袋，假模假样地表示顺服。{/n}

languages.text: «¿No? Supongo que no. A veces me canso de esta máscara; dame un minuto y retomaremos nuestro juego». {n}Marazhai agacha la cabeza con fingida deferencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No? I suppose I don't. Sometimes I tire of this mask — give me a minute and we will return to our game." {n}Marazhai inclines his head in feigned deference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿No? Supongo que no. A veces me canso de esta máscara; dame un minuto y retomaremos nuestro juego». {n}Marazhai agacha la cabeza con fingida deferencia.{/n}

languages.text: « Vraiment ? C'est bien possible. Porter un tel masque est parfois lassant... Donnez-moi un instant et nous pourrons reprendre notre petit jeu. » {n}Marazhai incline la tête avec une déférence feinte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No? I suppose I don't. Sometimes I tire of this mask — give me a minute and we will return to our game." {n}Marazhai inclines his head in feigned deference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? C'est bien possible. Porter un tel masque est parfois lassant... Donnez-moi un instant et nous pourrons reprendre notre petit jeu. » {n}Marazhai incline la tête avec une déférence feinte.{/n}

languages.text: "Nicht? Ich schätze, das ist so. Manchmal bin ich diese Maske leid – gebt mir kurz Zeit und wir spielen unser Spiel weiter." {n}Marazhai neigt den Kopf in scheinbarer Hochachtung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No? I suppose I don't. Sometimes I tire of this mask — give me a minute and we will return to our game." {n}Marazhai inclines his head in feigned deference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nicht? Ich schätze, das ist so. Manchmal bin ich diese Maske leid – gebt mir kurz Zeit und wir spielen unser Spiel weiter." {n}Marazhai neigt den Kopf in scheinbarer Hochachtung.{/n}

languages.text: 「いいや？そうは思わないな。時々、この仮面に飽きを覚えるんだ…少し時間をくれ。それからゲームに戻ろうじゃないか」{n}マラズハイは敬意を装いつつ首をかしげる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No? I suppose I don't. Sometimes I tire of this mask — give me a minute and we will return to our game." {n}Marazhai inclines his head in feigned deference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「いいや？そうは思わないな。時々、この仮面に飽きを覚えるんだ…少し時間をくれ。それからゲームに戻ろうじゃないか」{n}マラズハイは敬意を装いつつ首をかしげる。{/n}

languages.original_text: "No? I suppose I don't. Sometimes I tire of this mask — give me a minute and we will return to our game." {n}Marazhai inclines his head in feigned deference.{/n}

languages.text: "Öyle mi? Sanırım öyle. Bazen bu maskeden sıkılıyorum. Bana bir dakikalığına müsaade edersen oyunumuza geri dönebiliriz." {n}Marazhai, sahte bir itaatle başını eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No? I suppose I don't. Sometimes I tire of this mask — give me a minute and we will return to our game." {n}Marazhai inclines his head in feigned deference.{/n}
